long_description: Diamondback Mini Impression 16 in. kids' bike offers simple, sturdy performance and fun style for riders developing their riding skills. Sturdy, high-tensile steel frame and fork stand up to demanding use. Sloped top tube accommodates a short stand-over height and lets kids comfortably put their feet flat on the ground while straddling the bike. Front pouch conveniently stashes small essentials. Single-speed drivetrain with protective chainguard offers simplicity and low maintenance. Rear coaster brake eases learning the fine art of speed management; all kids have to do is simply backpedal to engage the brake. 16 in. wheels are outfitted with Street Style tires for performance on and off the road. The Diamondback Mini Impression 16 in. kids' bike includes a set of heavy-duty, removable training wheels to get new riders started on the basics of balance. Specs are subject to change.
short_description: Diamondback Mini Impression 16 in. kids' bike offers simple, sturdy performance and fun style for riders developing their riding skills.
